import React from "react"; import { Formik, Field, Form, ErrorMessage } from "formik"; import * as Yup from "yup"; // Components : import NavBar from "./NavBar"; import TextInput from "../Common Components/TextInput"; function AddDocket() { const initialValues = { name: "", startTime: "", endTime: "", hoursWorked: "", ratePerHour: "", supplierName: "", poNumber: "", }; // Define validation schema using Yup const validationSchema = Yup.object({ name: Yup.string().min(3).max(10).required("Name is required"), startTime: Yup.string().required("Start Time is required"), endTime: Yup.string().required("End Time is required"), hoursWorked: Yup.string().required("No of Hours Worked is required"), ratePerHour: Yup.string().required("Rate Per Hour is required"), supplierName: Yup.string().required("Rate Per Hour is required"), poNumber: Yup.string().required("Rate Per Hour is required"), }); // Handle form submission const handleSubmit = (values) => { // You can perform actions with the form values here console.log("123456"); console.log("Form values:", values); }; return (
{/* */} {/*

); } export default AddDocket;
